sentences.en: A similar but somewhat more involved derivation can be used to establish the shearing strains.
sentences.cn: 与此类似但稍微复杂的推导可以得出剪应变.

sentences.en: Abstract: A concise derivation of energy formula of diatomic molecules is proposed.
sentences.cn: 文摘: 对非刚性双原子分子的能量表达式给出一种简明的推导.

sentences.en: Calculation shows that the theoretical derivation and numerical results are correct.
sentences.cn: 计算表明,本文的理论推导是正确的,数值结果是可靠的.

sentences.en: De Wiest criticized Jacob's derivation and exposition.
sentences.cn: 德维斯特批评了雅各布的推导,且提出了略为不同的解释.

sentences.en: It might seem surprising that any mathematical derivation based on the kinetic theory could be simple.
sentences.cn: 令人惊奇的是,基于分子运动论的数学推导都是简单的.

sentences.en: Most system testers approach this derivation based on their intuition and experiences.
sentences.cn: 大部分的系统测试者是基于他们的直觉和经验实践着这种做法.

sentences.en: Our derivation lacks rigour in this regard.
sentences.cn: 我们的推导在这方面是不严格的.

sentences.en: Previous chapters have dealt with the derivation of systems of difference equations.
sentences.cn: 前面几章已经论述了差分方程组的推导.

sentences.en: So Yongping copper ore deposit possessed the derivation characteristics of metallization.
sentences.cn: 永平铜矿床具明显的衍生成矿特点.

sentences.en: The custom is of Scottish derivation.
The derivation of its name is obscure.
sentences.cn: 其名字的由来鲜为人知。

sentences.en: The word is of old French derivation.
This derivation is only valid if no chain scission accompanies crosslinking.
sentences.cn: 这一关系式仅适用于交联时不伴有断链发生的情况.

sentences.en: Under a nonvirtual derivation, both kinds of access would be ambiguous.
sentences.cn: 在非虚派生情况下, 两种访问都可能是二义性的.

words.tran_cn: 可诱导的；可推论的；可引出的
得到；推断（derive的过去分词）；由…而来

trans.tran_en: the origin of something, especially a word
